beer.beer_description: Get lost in the fog like that period between Xmas and NYE. "Haven't the Foggiest" oozes with tropical fruit flavours that will hit you like a sun drenched wave. Think passionfruit, mango, coconut, and gooseberry accompanied by a soft pillowy head. Deceptively smooth, dangerously drinkable and will leave you questioning everything... Except your next sip.

items.checkin_comment: Very nice stuff. Pine coconut on the palate, with a bright passionfruit nose. Hints of green tomato stem and a little pepper. But with a surprisingly curt and refreshing finish. Very well done.
